component.name: listExperiments
component.description: Retrieve a list of experiments from GoogleAnalytics account.

component.name: createExperiment
component.description: Retrieve a list of experiments from GoogleAnalytics account.

component.name: getExperiment
component.description: Retrieve details of a experiment identified by the provided experiment ID.

component.name: updateExperiment
component.description: Update details of the experiment identified by the provided experiment ID.

component.name: patchExperiment
component.description: Update an existing experiment. This method supports patch semantics.
